      • createAdvertisement

        public Advertisement createAdvertisement(java.lang.String userName,
                                         java.lang.String title,
                                         java.lang.String content,
                                         java.lang.String test,
                                         boolean is_vip,
                                         java.lang.String placeName,
                                         java.lang.String categoryName)
        Method that creates an ad. Information about the current logged user is being requested from database, so the ad can be created without prompting the user for such information. Persists the gathered information.
        Returns:
        an object from Advertisement, containing all required ads fields.
